description: A great trail running trip. The first half is easy, following the commonly used mountain biking trails of Lynn Canyon. The second half follows a not widely used trail to the top of Grouse. If you like Grouse Mountain but are tired of Grouse Grind, try this.
directions: Transit or drive to Deep Cove, where you start the usual Baden Powell trail.
title: Baden Powell - Deep Cove to top of Grouse Mountain
